preference.name: MciPMIJTDataset_Details
preference.preference_description: Defines the relation of the owning item with the Direct Model dataset, the dataset type and the named reference to be used. The format for Valid Values: "Relation:DatasetType:NamedReference", e.g. "IMAN_Rendering:DirectModel:JTPART".
